contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of March, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court with direction that it reconsider this matter in light of Kendrick v. District Attorney of Philadelphia Cty., 591 Pa. 157, 916 A.2d 529 (2007).
